meta_keywords: 11th Hour Podcast with Pastor Mike Davis
data.meta_description: Join host Pastor Mike Davis as he talks about the youth, family, and community! Changing the verbiage of "at-risk youth" to kids in their 11th hour! Pastor Mike is passionate about shaping the lives of the youth that are in difficult situations and finding their way. Listen in for practical tips andâ¦
data.text:
Welcome back to the 11th Hour Podcast with Pastor Mike! He's back like he's left something bringing all the inspiration and real talk regarding faith, family and community! Welcome to the 11th Hour Podcast with Pastor Mike, where we dive deep into thought-provoking conversations about faith, culture, and everything in between. In today's episode, Pastor Mike sits down with Jeremy Lee to discuss "Last Word Letters" - a powerful tool that helps individuals write letters to their loved ones that can be cherished long after they are gone.

During the conversation, Jeremy shares the inspiration behind the creation of Last Word Letters and how it has impacted the lives of many people. Together, they explore the importance of leaving a legacy and the power of words in shaping our relationships. Don't forget to check out lastwordletters.com, where you can find more information about the service and use code "STP" to get 20% off your purchase. By using this code, you'll also be supporting the mission of STP - a non-profit organization that provides support to families affected by terminal illnesses. Tune in to this episode of the 11th Hour Podcast with Pastor Mike for a meaningful and inspiring conversation about the value of leaving a lasting legacy through the power of words. Be sure to like, share, follow, and leave a 5-star review!

Welcome back to the 11th Hour Podcast! Pastor Mike has a very special guest in the studio, Jolene Radnoti, executive director with Read to Succeed. They will be covering the typical 11th Hour topics of family, faith, and community! Listen in for all the greatness!Â

Read to Succeed can be found at www.readtosucceed.org

As always be sure to check out nicholasfoundation.org for more information and to support the show!

The 11th Hour Podcast with Pastor Michael Davis is back with another exciting episode featuring a special guest, Jeremiah Roper, better known as DJ Squiggles. Join us as we delve into Jeremiah's life and learn about all the exciting projects he's working on.

Â

Jeremiah is known for his passion for music, but he's also an advocate for faith, family, and community. On this episode, he shares his insights on how he balances his career with his personal beliefs and how he uses his platform to make a difference in the world.

Â

If you're looking for inspiration and guidance on how to navigate your own faith journey while pursuing your passions, this is an episode you don't want to miss. So, tune in and join us for an engaging conversation on the 11th Hour Podcast with Pastor Michael Davis and special guest, DJ Squiggles!

Welcome back to the 11th Hour with Pastor Mike! Today he is sitting down with Rondell Clark! This guy is a legend. He is a husband, father, former athlete, owner of F.A.C.E. IT Fitness and most importantly a man of God. His faith is very important to him and he has an inspirational story. They are going to get into all of the 11th Hour topics...faith, family and community
